meanings.definition: Relating to a body of ten magistrates in ancient Rome.
meanings.sent1: The decemviral council made important decisions for the city.
meanings.sent2: The decemviral laws were crucial for governing the ancient Roman society.
meanings.sent3: The decemviral ceremonies were always grand and impressive.
meanings.sent4: Her leadership style was described as decemviral, commanding respect from all.
meanings.sent5: The decemviral authority was evident in every aspect of their rule.

meanings.definition: A member of a body of ten magistrates in ancient Rome.
meanings.sent1: As a decemviral, he played a key role in the governance of the city.
meanings.sent2: The decemviral was responsible for upholding the laws of ancient Rome.
meanings.sent3: The decemviral's toga was always impeccably clean and well-maintained.
meanings.sent4: In the senate, his voice carried the weight of a decemviral.
meanings.sent5: The decemviral's decisions shaped the fate of the Roman citizens.
